data.title: Joyalukkasindia
data.meta_description: Posts about GOLD written by Joyalukkasindia
data.text:
Honorable Chief Minister, Mr. N.Rangaswamy launches ‘Joyalukkas Golden Carnival’

Pondicherry, May, 2014: The globally renowned jewellery retail chain Joyalukkas launches ‘Joyalukkas Golden Carnival’ extending for a period of 2 months. Shoppers will get a chance to win the dream prizes on shopping worth Rs.10,000/- at any of the Joyalukkas Jewellery showrooms across the state. Honorable Chief Minister, Mr. N.Rangaswamy was present at the Pondicherry showroom for the launch along with other esteemed guests. This is an initiative by the world’s favourite jeweler, Joyalukkas to add to the festive mood during the French Fest.

“Our business is to cater to desires and aspirations of jewellery lovers and with the addition of mega winnings of 12 BMW 3 series cars and 2 kg gold we now hope to also make their dreams come true. We have planned exquisite collections, best prices and dream winnings so that shoppers during this peak buying period get the best for their money,” said Mr. Joy Alukkas, Chairman & MD, Joyalukkas Group.

The Joyalukkas Golden Carnival starts extends uptill 2nd August, 2014. Joyalukkas has also introduced a host of new collections and designs in gold, diamond, polki, pearl, precious stones to meet the demand and expectation of the shoppers.

‘Joyalukkas Golden Carnival will be one of the biggest winnings to excite the shoppers. Our objective is to make every customer feel special at Joyalukkas’ said Mr. John Paul Joy Alukkas, Executive Director of Joyalukkas group. Joyalukkas Golden Carnival is one of the biggest promotional initiatives launched by the Superbrand for jewellery shoppers. The initiative will be simultaneously launched across all Joyalukkas Showrooms in the Middle-East and India. The winner of Superbrand status 5 years in a row has created this dream package of winnings based on in-depth research and understanding of customers needs and aspirations.

About Joyalukkas Group:

Joyalukkas Group is a multi-billion dollar global conglomerate with varied business interests. The group operates its various business operations across UAE, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait, Qatar, Singapore, London & India. The group businesses include jewellery, money exchange, fashion & textiles, luxury air charter, Malls & Realty. Joyalukkas employs a staff of over 6000 professionals across the world and is one of the most awarded and recognized jewellery retail chains in the world.
